name: pieui
description: A React component library featuring PieCard component

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && rm -rf pieui-*.tgz && bun run build:clean && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:esm && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:cjs && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:components:esm && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:components:cjs && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:types && NODE_ENV=production bun run build:cli && bun src/cli.ts postbuild --src-dir src --out-dir dist && bun pm pack
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.esm.js --format esm --target browser --minify --external react --external react-dom --external react/jsx-runtime --external highlight.js --external rehype-highlight
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --format cjs --target node --minify --external react --external react-dom --external react/jsx-runtime --external highlight.js --external rehype-highlight
scripts.build:components:esm: bun build src/components/index.ts --outfile dist/components/index.esm.js --format esm --target browser --minify --external react --external react-dom --external react/jsx-runtime --external highlight.js --external rehype-highlight
scripts.build:components:cjs: bun build src/components/index.ts --outfile dist/components/index.js --format cjs --target node --minify --external react --external react-dom --external react/jsx-runtime --external highlight.js --external rehype-highlight
scripts.build:cli: bun build src/cli.ts --outfile dist/cli.js --format cjs --target node
